StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Identification of Disease-Causing Mutations in SCID using Exome-Wide Sequencing

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: A sample statement for the acknowledgment of the Identification of Disease-Causing Mutations in SCID using Exome-Wide Sequencing dataset(s) follows: “The Identification of Disease-Causing Mutations in SCID using Exome-Wide Sequencing Study was funded by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute of the United States National Institutes of Health (5RC1HL099617).”
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. The informed consent document signed by the Pro0009067 Database and Cell DNA/RNA Repository Study Participants allows use of these data by investigators employed by non-profit and for-profit organizations. These data may be used by private companies in the development of diagnostics and therapeutics under the current consent.
